headline: Stock Market Today, Feb. 5: Peloton Slides After Revenue Miss and Weak Guidance
summary: Today, Feb. 5, 2026, investors confront a steep post-earnings sell-off as Peloton’s shrinking subscriptions collide with a CFO exit.

raw.headline: Stock Market Today, Feb. 5: Peloton Slides After Revenue Miss and Weak Guidance

headline: Growth Scare Hits Markets Edgy From Tech Selloff
summary: Growth fears rattled Wall Street on Thursday, with signs of weakening in the labor market sparking another day of steep stock-market declines.  Stocks fell widely after a trio of reports from both government and private sources showed unexpectedly low job openings for December, surprisingly high claims for unemployment insurance last week and a sharp uptick in corporate job cuts last month.  Declines were particularly acute in stocks tied to consumer discretionary spending.

headline: JPMorgan Raises Lululemon (LULU) Q4 2025 EPS Estimate Following ICR Conference Meeting Citing Updated 2026 Projections
summary: Lululemon Athletica Inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) is one of the stocks that should double by 2030. On January 20, JPMorgan raised the price target on Lululemon to $209 from $203 and maintained a Neutral rating. After having hosted a meeting with the company’s VP of Investor Relations at the ICR Conference, the firm raised its Q4 2025 […]
